nodes.excerpt: Coupler.io synchronizes data between Airtable, Clockify, Shopify, Trello, etc., and Google Sheets allowing you to bring data into a single place and customize your reporting. Try Coupler.io Free-forever plan now and auto-import up to 50K rows per month!

nodes.author: Olexander Paladiy

localize.description: Coupler.io可以在Airtable、Clockify、Shopify、Trello等和Google Sheets之间同步数据，让您将数据集中到一个地方，并自定义您的报告。现在就试试Coupler.io免费计划，每月自动导入多达5万行的数据。

nodes.excerpt: Porter is a platform that makes AWS/GCP as easy to use as Heroku. With instant deploys from Git, built-in autoscaling, and automatic SSL, Porter gives you the convenience of a PaaS while preserving flexibility and control.
nodes.title: Porter - Heroku that runs in your own cloud
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Porter是一个让AWS/GCP像Heroku一样容易使用的平台。通过Git的即时部署、内置自动缩放和自动SSL，Porter为您提供了PaaS的便利，同时保留了灵活性和控制力。
localize.tagline: 运行在自己云端的Heroku

localize.description: Porter是一個讓AWS/GCP像Heroku一樣容易使用的平臺。通過Git的即時部署、內置自動縮放和自動SSL，Porter爲您提供了PaaS的便利，同時保留了靈活性和控制力。
localize.tagline: 運行在自己雲端的Heroku

nodes.excerpt: Think of Speeko like a gym membership for your voice. Get instant feedback on your speaking style, and track your progress over time. Personalized activities help you build new skills in just 5 minutes a day. You'll be speaking with confidence in no time!

nodes.author: Nico Aguilar

localize.description: 想想看，Speeko就像您的声音的健身会员。您可以获得关于您的口语风格的即时反馈，并随着时间的推移追踪您的进步。个性化的活动帮助您在每天5分钟内培养新技能。您很快就会变得自信满满。
localize.tagline: A.I.Powered Public Speaking and presenter coach (A.I.动力公共演讲和主持人教练)

localize.description: 想想看，Speeko就像您的聲音的健身會員。您可以獲得關於您的口語風格的即時反饋，並隨着時間的推移追蹤您的進步。個性化的活動幫助您在每天5分鐘內培養新技能。您很快就會變得自信滿滿。

nodes.excerpt: Collecting binding e-signatures is a hassle. Etch e-sign free simplifies this process to three easy steps: upload a PDF, choose up to two signers, and send a signature request for free. Signers can review and sign documents from anywhere on any device.
nodes.title: Etch E-Sign Free - Simple, intuitive and binding e-signatures, absolutely free
nodes.author: Mang-Git Ng

localize.description: 收集具有约束力的电子签名是一件很麻烦的事情。Etch e-sign free将这一过程简化为三个简单的步骤：上传一个PDF文件，选择最多两个签名人，并免费发送签名请求。签署人可以在任何设备上随时随地查看和签署文件。
localize.tagline: 简单、直观、有约束力的电子签名，完全免费。

localize.description: 收集具有約束力的電子簽名是一件很麻煩的事情。Etch e-sign free將這一過程簡化爲三個簡單的步驟：上傳一個PDF文件，選擇最多兩個簽名人，並免費發送簽名請求。簽署人可以在任何設備上隨時隨地查看和簽署文件。
localize.tagline: 簡單、直觀、有約束力的電子簽名，完全免費。

nodes.excerpt: Engineering time is valuable, and securing your application flows can be challenging and time consuming. With OTPfy you can secure any part of your application with ease without wasting any more time and resources.
nodes.title: OTPfy - Secure your apps with magic links and one time passwords
nodes.author: Alex Casillas

localize.description: 工程时间是宝贵的，而保护您的应用流程是具有挑战性和耗时性的。有了OTPfy，您可以轻松地保护您应用程序的任何部分，而无需浪费更多的时间和资源。
localize.tagline: 使用魔法链接和一次性密码保护您的应用程序。

localize.description: 工程時間是寶貴的，而保護您的應用流程是具有挑戰性和耗時性的。有了OTPfy，您可以輕鬆地保護您應用程序的任何部分，而無需浪費更多的時間和資源。
localize.tagline: 使用魔法鏈接和一次性密碼保護您的應用程序。

nodes.excerpt: Spaceman is an application for macOS that allows you to view your Spaces in the menu bar. Spaceman allows you to see which space you are currently on relative to the other spaces you have. Naming these spaces is also an option.
nodes.title: Spaceman - A macOS app to view virtual desktops in the menu bar
nodes.author: Jay

localize.description: Spaceman是一款适用于macOS的应用程序，它允许你在菜单栏中查看你的空间。Spaceman可以让你看到你当前所处的空间与你拥有的其他空间的相对关系。命名这些空间也是一个选项。
localize.tagline: 一个macOS应用程序，在菜单栏中查看虚拟桌面。

localize.description: Spaceman是一款適用於macOS的應用程序，它允許你在菜單欄中查看你的空間。Spaceman可以讓你看到你當前所處的空間與你擁有的其他空間的相對關係。命名這些空間也是一個選項。

nodes.excerpt: Distributed is a new live social chat app to help remote teams stay in sync. It started off as a jamstack demo but after spending 2-3 hours on it every day we realised it filled a huge hole in our work life as we all went remote.

localize.description: Distributed是一款新的实时社交聊天应用，帮助远程团队保持同步。它一开始只是一个果酱演示，但在每天花2-3个小时在上面之后，我们意识到它填补了我们工作生活中的一个巨大漏洞，因为我们都去了远程。
localize.tagline: 与朋友、家人和同事保持同步。

localize.tagline: 與朋友、家人和同事保持同步。

nodes.excerpt: Sleepedy provides personalized sleep therapy by connecting you with a sleep coach and automatically tracking your sleep with wearables like the Apple Watch and Oura Ring. If you don't have one, we'll lend you an Apple Watch.

localize.tagline: 通过私人睡眠教练跟踪和改善睡眠

localize.description: Sleepedy通過將你與睡眠教練聯繫起來，並通過Apple Watch和Oura Ring等可穿戴設備自動跟蹤你的睡眠，提供個性化的睡眠治療。如果你沒有，我們會借給你一個Apple Watch。
localize.tagline: 通過私人睡眠教練跟蹤和改善睡眠

nodes.excerpt: Hunter Author Finder is a new way to find targeted email addresses of bloggers and journalists. Enter an article URL and get the contact information of the author in seconds.
nodes.title: Hunter Author Finder - Find bloggers and journalists email addresses
nodes.author: François Grante

localize.description: Hunter Author Finder是一种新的方式来寻找博客和记者的目标电子邮件地址。输入一个文章的URL，并在几秒钟内获得作者的联系信息。
localize.tagline: 寻找博客和记者的电子邮件地址

localize.description: Hunter Author Finder是一種新的方式來尋找博客和記者的目標電子郵件地址。輸入一個文章的URL，並在幾秒鐘內獲得作者的聯繫信息。
localize.tagline: 尋找博客和記者的電子郵件地址

nodes.excerpt: Blockchain and Crypto products are submitted and voted upon by the Block Zen community every day (just like Product Hunt). Block Zen helps you can track the daily innovations taking place in this space.
nodes.title: Block Zen - Blockchain and Crypto products upvoted daily
nodes.author: SunnySilo

localize.description: 区块链和加密产品每天都会由Block Zen社区提交和投票（就像Product Hunt一样）。Block Zen帮助你可以追踪这个领域每天发生的创新。
localize.tagline: 区块链和加密产品每天都会被上榜

localize.description: 區塊鏈和加密產品每天都會由Block Zen社區提交和投票（就像Product Hunt一樣）。Block Zen幫助你可以追蹤這個領域每天發生的創新。
localize.tagline: 區塊鏈和加密產品每天都會被上榜
